body.name: STEM Building Toys for Kids with 2-in-1 Remote Control Racer Snap Together Engineering Kits Early Learning Racecar Building Blocks - Best Gift for 6 7 8 9＋Year Old Boys and Girls
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 20 hrs 46 mins
features: Flexible Remote Control – Ultimate STEM toys for boys and girls, our 2-in-1 remote-controlled cars come with a simple remote design that makes them easier to move, drive, turn, and spin on smooth, flat surfaces indoor or out.

2-in-1 Vehicle Creation – This building set lets you make an off-road truck and a racecar with easy-to-use pieces that are perfect for building and construction. And when you’re finished, use the remote control to drive them !

Imagination and Learning – These snap-together building games block toys for kids are great for strengthening hand-eye coordination, promoting creativity, enhancing critical thinking and development skills, and having fun at the same time.

Bright, Colorful Pieces – The ultra-bright green and black design makes the more fun and engaging toys for children ages 8 and up. And our STEM building toys are also a great way to build social bonds or strengthen your relationship with your kids. Great gift for birthday/Children's Day/ Christmas/Chanukkah/Easter/summer camp activities/Black Friday/ back to school.
Premium Quality and After-sale Service: Any problem or concern, please kindly feel free to contact us. We will get you covered within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: When you want to inspire your child to learn more about STEM while still having a great time, nothing provides hours of creative, hands-on fun quite like Gamzoo STEM Engineering Educational Toys A 2-in-1 car-building system, you and your child can easily put together two different vehicles that can be driven, moved, and raced on most any smooth surface. And because the pieces snap together easily, hold firm with proper balance and construction, and can be enjoyed by children 6, 7, 8, 9 year old and up, they’re fun for boys and girls alike. Warning: Choking Hazard - Small parts. Not for children under 3 years.

Children's ideal gift is the best choice for you and your children A great birthday gift, holiday surprise, or Christmas present, get this popular 2-in-1 STEM engineering car set for your child today and start promoting hands-on fun and engaging excitement that helps them grow, learn, and enjoy early learning. Product Details: 2-in-1 Remote-Controlled Racer Includes Easy-to-Use Remote Control STEM Engineering and Building Toys Directional Fine Tuning Simple Snap Together Pieces Movable and Drivable Play Get one of these premium STEM engineering toys that creates two different remote-controlled vehicles!

GAMZOO Remote Control Off-Racecar 3 in 1 Remote Control Racing Car Building Blocks 2 in 1 Remote Control Racing Car Building Blocks Gesture Sensing Stunt RC Car Pieces 335 PCS 388 420 PCS Models 2 in 1 Mode 3 in 1 Mode 2 in 1 Mode RC CAR Recommended Age 6-14 8+ 6+ 6+ Recommended Gender Boys / Girls Boys / Girls Boys / Girls Boys / Girls BPA FREE ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought this for my friend's kid... I want one now haha
reviews.reviewText: Purchasing this as a birthday gift was an absolute hit! I bought this as a gift for a friend's son's birthday while it was on sale. My goodness they seemed to have a blast putting it together and loved the process involved. Honestly I am thinking I might need to buy one either for myself or for when I will hopefully have my own boy. Highly recommended for anyone seeking an engaging and educational toy for kids. A definite winner in terms of fun and learning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was such a fun, affordable gift! Even for a grown up! After "driving" it up and down the hallway, it is now proudly on display!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son had fun putting together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Car not working
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for my son for Christmas but decided to gift it for his 6th birthday in February...Now after putting it together today the car does not work. We change the battery in both the remote and the car and still does not work. I do believe it is the remote because I do not see any light from the remote when we turn on the remote. Now it is pass the return policy and cannot return the product.*UPDATE*This company responded very quickly after my review. They sent me a new car without any questions. Also their customer service was excellent. Thank you Gamzoo for resolving this issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a friend's 11 year old. Let's just say, the smile on his face and the excitement he had was priceless!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fun and relatively fast to assemble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice customers service...... but the product?
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my 9 year old son. One we got first has a missing part. I contacted the seller, they responded quickly and sent a replacement(whole set) "Thank you" But now the remote controller of my replacement doesn't work. I guess based on overall good reviews this just happed to me.My son usually have no problem to build LEGOs all by himself but this he needed my help 3-4 times to build it.Although he complained a little that his two thumbs were getting red and numb, I think he enjoyed.I can tell this would be a big challenge for 6 years.I love the structure but the quality of this products are a bit below LEGOs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great both indoors and outside.
reviews.reviewText: My 6 year old grandson assembled by himself and loves this racecar!
